title: ‘Pluribus’ Creator Vince Gilligan Explains That Ominous Finale Punchline and What Lies Ahead in Season 2
summary: Gilligan with senior writers/executive producers Gordon Smith and Alison Tatlock tell The Hollywood Reporter they know exactly where the show is going after that bombshell cliffhanger — unlike when they painted themselves into corners on 'Breaking Bad' — but viewers will have to wait a bit for season two.
